title: 31,000 msgs in inbox.  Can only delete one-at-a-time.  HELP!
content: 31,000 msgs in inbox. Can only delete one-at-a-time. Keep getting error messages when I try to delete or move more than 1 msg. "Can't write to folder","Writing to folder failed", etc. HELP!
creator: ammoguide

title: GMail is crowding out Thunderbird.
content: Until recently any request to email a web-page, automatically set up the message in my Thunderbird form. Recently the messages are being set up in my Gmail account. I NEVER send messages via Gmail, always through Thunderbird.
creator: lestkelly

title: Can't send messages from Thunderbird through Gmail account
content: Over the years I've had to stop using several gmail addresses for 1 simple reason. Randomly, I begin getting this message when trying to send an email: Sending of the message failed. Unable to authenticate to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.googlemail.com. Please check the password and verify the 'Authentication method' in 'Account settings / Outgoing server (SMTP)'. The password is correct, it's never changed. I can login to gmail online and login in with it. I can see my messages, but I can't login through Thunderbird. The stupid thing is I can download messages from the account, I just can't send any back. I've spent hours in total going through Gmail and Thunderbird settings and can't find where the fault lies and eventually have to just stop using the account. Can anyone suggest what the problem is?
creator: addyjustforregistering

title: White Border
content:
Hello,

I am writing to report an issue I've been encountering with Thunderbird. When I open the application, it functions normally. However, if I minimize it and then reopen it from the taskbar, a white border appears around the window.

I would appreciate any guidance or solutions you may be able to provide.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Sincerely, Michael
creator: mike.android.nz

title: I used a filter and template for an out of office - It wont turn off now
content:
I set up an out of office filter and email template that worked fine.

Ive now deleted both the template and the filter but my email is still sending out the out of office.

Please help
creator: rob255

title: Is there any way to *always* update my calendar when an invite update is sent?
content:
We use the Thunderbird calendar all the time. It's very frustrating that invite updates come in, and I have to click "Update" on each one to have my calendar be updated.

I *never* want my local calendar to not have the latest information in it about when/where the meeting is.

Is there any way to have all updates to existing invitations be processed automatically as they arrive?
creator: andrewducker

title: Unwanted Thunderbird Update
content: Why does Thunderbird keep updating without my approval and without even asking? I even set it not to update at all. But then I start my PC and find it updated. Why does it do this? I had version 102 and it's updating to 115. I'm not interested in the new version. It's worse for me.
creator: tscharli101
